about_the_game:
Every hero needs a place to kick back and rest after a long day of journeying. Bring those pitstops to life with this civilization inspired music pack.

With songs for a wide variety of castles, towns, and bustling cities, your adventurers will always have a place to call home. G3: Civilization is a great addition to your growing library of RPG Maker resources.

Tracklist:

1 - Castle001
2 - Castle002
3 - Castle003
4 - Castle004
1 - Town 001
2 - Town 002
3 - Town 003
4 - Town 004
5 - Town 005
6 - Town 006

Features:

  • 4 Castle themes.
  • 6 Town themes that fit a variety of towns. From home sweet home, to downtown nightlife.
  • Each song was carefully crafted for RPG Maker, and loops seamlessly in the program.
  • OGG format
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker projects.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
